ygData.subject: Thoughts and a question.
ygData.msgSnippet: This may be kind of trival, but last night I started to get really bummed.  My wife joined a good race only guild and I am now unable to join with her. :( To
ygData.messageBody:
This may be kind of trival, but last night I started to
get really bummed. My wife joined a "good race only"
guild and I am now unable to join with her. :(
To make up for this, I went to Neriak and started
killing things. Heh.
I was on the hunt for Bone Chips so that I could stock
up for my pet spells. Regular Skellies are now blue and
ocasionally black. While there I saved the life of a DE
Necro. I ended up giving this Necro 14 bone chips, and
an almost complete set of Netted (after I bought a
complete set of leather, minus gloves and cap). I felt
content to help out another player, especially since I
know how much spells cost and how weak magic using
people are at low level.
From an RP perspective this was not against my class.
Why? I helped out an evil race necro. In doing so I
have invested power in the war vs. the goodies. It also
puts that Necro in my debt. Which she says she is and to
ask her for help anytime I need it. heh! That will come
in handy at later levels. ;) Score one for Thule!
Now ack to the original statement and an inquirey.
Does anyone on this list know of a guild on Bertoxxulous
that accepts evil characters and is looking for
members? The guild itself need not be evil, but that
would be ok too. :)

--
Cronik
Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
6th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and they
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
